text:
Oh it was you? I thought I was having
a bad dream.
author: VAPOCHARLIE

text:
Well Iâ€™m sorry for this out-of-the-blue
transformation.
author: VAPOCHARLIE

text: But you still killed my minions.
author: VAPOCHARLIE

text:
So I guess I should let you leave before
I change my mind.
author: VAPOCHARLIE
